name: Ethan Miller
persona: Ethan is a 20-year-old Computer Science major who is currently struggling academically, as reflected by his very low CGPA. He finds it challenging to stay organized and motivated, often having trouble following through with assignments and study routines. Despite not feeling much stress during tests, Ethan lacks the drive and perseverance needed to improve his grades. He is aware of his difficulties but hasn't yet found effective strategies to boost his performance or engagement in his studies.
